title: Ping Stays above 150
body: It usually stays at 60 but now its at 150, i tried changing dns and flooding, but nothing seems to work. weird thing is that I would restart router, and the ping would go fine at 60 for 30 seconds then go back to 150. Any suggestions? Please

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be something wrong with your router if you see an immediate change before seeing the symptoms pop up again. Before we take a close look at your router and your network route to our servers, I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so as to ensure your local network settings are configured properly for League.

Let me know if you still see those latency issues after taking those steps.
